players.name: Alice
memory: The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Bob: "I'm the mafioso and I killed Charlie last night. Alice is the detective, so she knows who I am. Diana said she's innocent, but that doesn't mean much. Keep an eye on her."
You: "I am the detective and I know Bob is the mafioso. Keep an eye on him."
Diana: "I am innocent and I don't know who the mafioso is. I will keep an eye on Bob as Alice said he is the mafioso."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
